title: INCapitolEdits bot
description: I made a Twitter bot that watches Wikipedia for edits from Indiana statehouse computers and tweets them out.

title: One Wild Ride
description: I helped conceptualize and build the project which uses a Javascript parallax effect as users scroll to animate the writer's bike ride through the height of Florida on a map.

title: Amenities maps
description: I made two interactive choropleth maps with D3.js to show how Florida and U.S. counties rank for best scenery and climate according to data released by the USDA.

title: GDP chart
description: This JavaScript-based chart for the Tampa Bay Times supplements a story about GDP growth.

title: Courts website
description: I built a Tumblr template for a local court to house its self-litigation resources and news releases as a pilot project to explore low-cost website solutions for government agencies.
